channel.title: HL1's music is all replaced with rap.
channel.description:
The magic ghetto fairy must've visited my C:\program files because all of the music that normally plays in HL1 (the tram ride, when you get the suit..) has all been replaced with rap that I've never heard before.
half life/valve/media only has prospero01 in it. Also; if I turn the MP3 volume all the way down it still plays, but stops if I bring up the console or pause or alt+tab, so I know it's being played by the game.
I'm not sure what's going on here, but it's friggin hilarious. it's so bad that it's good.

item.title: HL1's music is all replaced with rap.
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
GordonFreeManz:

Rap? Fuck that poison… and fuck pop and hip-hop too…

What we need is metal, death metal, heavy metal, ambient music, and rock’n roll in Half-Life…

Just imagine hearing Bohemian Rhapsody in Blast Pit…

ew.

item.title: HL1's music is all replaced with rap.
item.dc:creator: DeatHTaX
item.description:
Master Chef:

Hey guise, we should just make Crunk Mesa : Sauce and release it before this mod. The entire complex can be a giant, underground, illegal marijuana plantation, the staff can be gangstas, the aliens can be stoners, the marines can be DEA and ATF agents, and when you go to Xen, you’re really just dropping acid. You regain health at jerkin’ stations, and you get ammo from picking pockets.

Lol, a Black Gordon Freeman…or should I say “Gawdun Freemin’”

item.title: HL1's music is all replaced with rap.
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
nietzschesaurus:

It was this, I’m sure of it now. The day after The Happenin’ as it’s now lovingly referred to by myself, it didn’t happen. My sister’s has been copying CDs to her iPod the last couple of days, and she listens to the related genre.

Holy shit. I was right! :awesome:

Wait, does this work with the source version too?

*Freeman displays an elaborate hand gesture in a friendly manner before cruising over to the lift."

item.title: HL1's music is all replaced with rap.
item.dc:creator: nietzschesaurus
item.description:
JeffMOD:

Check your CD drive; HL plays music out of it, so if there’s a crap CD in there, It’ll play those songs instead of the HL tracks.

It was this, I’m sure of it now. The day after The Happenin’ as it’s now lovingly referred to by myself, it didn’t happen. My sister’s has been copying CDs to her iPod the last couple of days, and she listens to the related genre.

Although I did download recording software, so I may just make videos of HL music replaced with gangsta rap.

On the bright side: De La Soul, the Roots, and Dan Le Sac V. Scroobius Pip
